Governor Walz issued an
Executive Order on March 25 which issues that

span.strong:
Distance Learning will begin
Monday, March 30 and continue
through April 30.

Friday, March 27 at 11:59 p.m.
through Friday, May 1

span.span: During this time we will continue to serve meals and provide school age care for the critical services as outlined
Our staff will operate on a reduced report to work schedule.

br.span: Staff will work from home when they are not in the building.

span.span:
Our goal is to slow the spread of COVID-19,
which means we need to reduce the number of people who interact with one another.
